org.openscience.cdk.io.cml

Class CMLErrorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.io.cml.CMLErrorHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorHandler

    public class CMLErrorHandler
extends Object
implements ErrorHandler
    CDK's SAX2 ErrorHandler for giving feedback on XML errors in the CML document. Output is redirected to org.openscience.cdk.tools.LoggingTool.
    Author:
    Egon Willighagen
    Belongs to CDK module:
    io
    Source code:
    master

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      boolean abortOnErrors 
      boolean reportErrors 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CMLErrorHandler()
      Constructor a SAX2 ErrorHandler that uses the cdk.tools.LoggingTool class to output errors and warnings to.
